name: Strongheart Tincture
description: While some elixirs try to cure harm, this tincture is intended to prevent the harm from occurring. Upon drinking this elixir, you gain the listed number of Temporary Hit Points and gain an item bonus to saving throws against effects with the death trait for 10 minutes.

versions.name: Minor
versions.description: You gain 5 temporary Hit Points and the item bonus is +1.

versions.name: Lesser
versions.description: You gain 10 temporary Hit Points and the item bonus is +1.

versions.name: Moderate
versions.description: You gain 20 temporary Hit Points and the item bonus is +2.

versions.name: Greater
versions.description: You gain 30 temporary Hit Points and the item bonus is +3.

versions.name: Major
versions.description: You gain 50 temporary Hit Points and the item bonus is +4.
